item.title: Automatic Resume Reply
item.description: Automatic Reply (Resume Reply) A few years ago I was searching for a new career opportunity and was doing all the techniques in book, and I was getting good interviews and follow ups, but I also had a busy schedule and work. Eventually like a snowball a lot of recruiters kept asking me for my resume and if I was interested but I couldn’t keep with the emails and I had I had FOMO
